Tutorial for classic ML
=======================

To get started with classic ML workflows, follow these guides:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

    Loading datasets for training </guide/classicml/datasets/index>
    Training models </guide/classicml/models/index>
    Evaluating models </guide/classicml/models/metrics>
    Deploying models </guide/classicml/models/modelstore>
    Adding business logic to models </guide/classicml/models/businessmodels/index>
    Serving models for real-time predictions </guide/clusters/restapi>
    Tracking and monitoring models </guide/classicml/models/tracking/index>
